response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $15,000 to me. However, considering your specific needs and how well it aligns with your objectives, I am offering this remarkable asset to you for $14,000. This represents a significant saving for you, as you perceive its value at $12,000. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for your venture. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
